website_summaries.verdict: Weighs in at 12 ounces of pure fun with a sleek design that connects with several device applications.
pros: Powered by batteries and built to last a full night of fun
The design is fashion forward and draws attention
Technology allows for constant entertainment via texting, animation, and more
cons: Not the sturdiest in terms of material and structure

customer_reviews.title: F U N
customer_reviews.text: Super cool glasses. I had a blast in new year and other parties. A little hard to see for sure but it is fun glasses plus the app on point. Easy to use, well made and fun!
customer_reviews.author: J O H N

customer_reviews.title: Only three problems
customer_reviews.text: My problems are that one of the LEDs broke after two days, it makes a really annoying creaking sound when I move my head, and it's making a really high-pitched beeping noise other then that it's good. (Also for the creaking imagine door creaking but more high pitch, and yes the photo from the glasses is from the same animation)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but brittle
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the glasses for a week, and the frame broke. This caused the button to come out, so I have to use a small object to turn them on. I do like these glasses, but it has only been one week!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: I loved these when they arrived
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when they arrived, and then they broke. The plastic is CRAP. There's NO flexibility to the frame, which means the they used cheap plastic. The pair I bought broke around the thinnest section were the Power button is located and I was no longer able to turn them on. I would not buy these for the simple fact that the material is not sturdy if you plan on wearing these at a rave, club, party, or anywhere were all it takes is a accidental bump to snap these fragile glasses into being useless.
customer_reviews.author: V-67

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters 17 and a drummer/Dj she had a talent show at school and i Thought this wud be nice during her performace. IT WAS!!! She was lit, glasses were dope she said she felt like a superstar. She wss suprised i ordered them. She said "mom how do u knw about all the cool stuff" Umm... maybe bcuz im a cool mom! Aren't we all? Lol
customer_reviews.author: Bgood

customer_reviews.title: Delayed delivery and broken LED right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: After waiting two additional days for delivery and disappointing my son for his birthday, when they did arrive he had it out of the box for 5 minutes before he realized the screen was faulty....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This should be a lot cheaper or a lot better.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrived and didn’t work. They were also missing a battery cover for one of the ear pieces (each of the “ear parts” of the glasses holds a AAA battery. I know this is supposed to be a fun gimmick, but I expected a much higher quality item than what I found in the box.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Cool at first, disappointing overall
customer_reviews.text: The concept is a cool concept for Raves. However, the fully customizable features are in no way fully customizable. Returned the item after only a few days
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: The fell apart very easy
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were a lot of fun for the first couple months i had them, and then they started getting broken. Pieces falling off and eventually the whole visor just fell off and i couldn't put them back together. I just found them in a storage container in its case so i was just reminded of how disappoint i was.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Akey

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses but a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are some very interesting glasses and are very easy to control from your phone with an app. I don't like though that it is reflective on the front of the glasses but I guess it makes since because if it wasn't reflective then people would be able to see the LEDs when they weren't on. The battery life is OK usually going about 2 hours of regular use for me. I however don't think that they are worth $70 and think they could be worth about $40-$50. It is a very unique product though.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua F

customer_reviews.title: Cool product but app is not monitors/filtered for content
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very cool and the app allows you to make cool custom messages and images. The major problem is that anyone can upload their design to the app so there is much inappropriate content (profanity) on the app. Not for children at all! Developer needs to screen user uploads. I stopped counting after 50 fu@k messages on the app.
customer_reviews.author: J.AX

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM BEFORE THEY DISAPPEAR FROM EXISTENCE!
customer_reviews.text: No lie this thing is a must have if you want any and all attention on you. From birthdays to full peacock mode the eyes are on you. I do not use Facebook and getting my hands on pre-created designs was out of my reach. Though my lovely wife has a account so she saved the day. Although, I was very turned off about this because who wants to sign in just to use this device. To my surprise it saves up to five and the button on the top corner of the glasses allows you to filter through them. Also, the nose guard is adjustable making it for me very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L Evans Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I would have give it one star but my daughter loves it so that’s why I give it 4. Is just overpriced glasses that you can write stuff on. My daughter finds it awesome and I can’t understand why. At $60 should be able to make dinner and some laundry. Save your money and try to convince your kids that it won’t last long or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Apple Phones
customer_reviews.text: The glasses looked cool, and definitely worked, but on my iOS device, the App Store had taken down the app due to suspicion of malware. Meaning, if you have an Apple product, you might be better looking for something else
customer_reviews.author: Orion Albright

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Android 10
customer_reviews.text: Please read EVERYTHING. Even the reviews on the app store. I was having trouble pairing these with my Samsung s10e which runs Android 10. It wouldn't connect. I read the reviews and found out that it won't work on Android 10. The product itself isn't very comfortable. Its very stiff and made of cheap plastic. You also need AAA batteries which was supposed to be included but mines didn't come with any.
customer_reviews.author: Sanyo

customer_reviews.title: I Love Um!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for all and all I wanted to put 4 stars but found my self lying. If say you get what you paid for + more! I love them. There a lot lighter in weight than they look. Plastic is smooth and sleek. Comes with a nice cloth case as well. Simple as he'll to use and sync. Great way yo express, share, excite or just have fun. Honestly if they contacted me and wanted idea designs I would be all over it. Haha. Make a delux edition with color options next guys. It would sell even more. Lol. If you're a techno geek or just love cyber fashion and fun gear. But this. 100% worth it in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I can see out of them just fine. I don't know why everyone is so irritated
customer_reviews.text: Y'all complaining about the smallest things. First off, I can see out of them just fine. I don't know why everyone is so irritated. Secondly, I think it would be great for making new friends for introverted people such as i. Thirdly, I like how in the app you can change the effects quickly. The only one thing that bothers me is that there's only one color :(
customer_reviews.author: Gelato Squad

customer_reviews.title: hmm I think I'll pass on another set of these and go for broke
customer_reviews.text: it's not a bad set of really cool spec but only lasted like a week when I brought it and broke when someone else put them on so the materials made were pretty cheap I will not be considering these specs for that smae price found the samething on wish.com for way way waaaaaay cheaper. May not be name brand but you could pass it off like it is
customer_reviews.author: paydro2208Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: I want to like this more
customer_reviews.text: I liked the app, the simplicity of adding names, or new scenes. However as many have mentioned the build quality is less than ideal. I used them maybe 3 times a week for a month for about 3 hours at a time while sitting and the top portion of the frame has already broken. If only they were stronger in the frame portion and maybe had an option for not mirrored. All in all spending this much on some glasses that are awesome but break in a month isn't a good value in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great party trick, but hard to see when it fogs up
customer_reviews.text: This has made parties significantly more fun with all sorts of expressions. However, if you're wearing a face mask, it fogs up pretty easily, and considering the grills are super slim, it's super hard to wipe off the condensation. My trick is to use a credit card and your shirt to help clear up most of it temporarily, but I wish the entire back could detach to make it easier to clean. Other than that, this will absolutely make you the center of attention if you want to be such
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: App needed to run better effects and app is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: see headline. You need to download an app to get the effects like the equalizergoing and have to connect to facebook. also the effects turn off for no reason after a while. i just stick to the presets. I was also left to believe this was rgb led lighting and i could have gotten a cheaper pair because of this misinformation.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Very cool but Need to make this with much smaller battery's.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool 😎 but the ear piece where the batters go are waayy too long and make them come up in the front and make them awkward to wear.. they take two double a battery's one behind each ear so you can imagine how bulky that would be.. but they are very cool and still like them alot. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Life of the party
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Used them for some parties on St. Patty's Day flashing and saying different things. App is easy to use and easy to create and program things. Works best in the dark, and people think they are awesome. Hard to see out of though, due to the slats. But that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: krk2816

customer_reviews.title: Best LED glasses for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are great with a few exceptions for me. When powering on, I dont think its needed to have that message stay on the screen. 1 or 2 lites to indicate power I think would be enough. Programming is a bit more complicated than I was hoping. Would be nice to have a 'Flip' option for when using my front facing camera. I understand why you would put the batteries in the ear overhang, but it does make it a bit bulky on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this! I immediately wore it out after getting the package today, and i got so many compliments from a lot of people! they love them, and I love them too. You can see out of them as well, and they fit quite well too! Easy usage with the app too! No matter what other people say about this product, I think this is Dedsec worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Never powered on from the start.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these in the mail, took them straight out of the box and installed the batteries and they would not power on. I'am returning them now. I will purchase another pair just to see if I can get a working pair but as of right now, I cannot rate this any higher than a 1 star... I'd actually rather rate it a 0 star but that's not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must be paired at all times via bluetooth to work.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. You must pair w something bluetooth constantly. So you would thing if its sold on Amazon, then Amazon would have an available app. Not the makers fault, but our kids all have Amazon tablets, so these will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: I Should Get A Credit
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by my header, these glasses were an absolute hit! I'm asking for a credit because since I wore my glasses, I know of at least 4 people who've ordered some, and a few more are ordering some (or so they say)...lol....you'll certainly be the life of the party in these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: D. James

customer_reviews.title: Solid Battery Life, Easy to Use, Could Function After Withstanding Being Dropped & Stepped On
customer_reviews.text: The headline says most of it. I took it out of the box and had it fully working in under 20 minutes, and the app is simple to understand and easy to use. Found a lot of cool stuff to put on them too using the app. I accidentally dropped these on pavement and even tripped and stepped on them, and the electronics still work fine. Batteries still haven't died and I've been using them on-and-off for two hour periods over the last few days. And if you bought these for a Wrench cosplay like me, you'll get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: C Watkins (C R DubU)

customer_reviews.title: They're fun to look at, a little tight on the head though.
customer_reviews.text: I think they're cool, don't get me wrong. If I went to a rave with these things they'd light me up. But the thickness of the sides because of the batteries just makes it uncomfortable, a bit tight on your head, and seeing out of them isn't very easy. They were fun for a while. Died after around 5 hours of constant use. So pretty good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Meowix

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Cool concept. Terrible product. Small frame, can barely see out of them, uncomfortable, and overpriced for what they are. I’d love my money back or to send these back...
customer_reviews.author: Ross D.

customer_reviews.title: Fits over glasses
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. He absolutely loves them. It was an easy set up on his phone and he was changing the messages on his glasses after a couple minutes. They fit over his prescription glasses which are a plus. Operated with one triple a battery on each side. I liked the way the product was packaged as well. Definitely worth the money and I might just get myself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, But I dont trust the plastic completely.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. Saw it on Unbox Therapys Youtube and i got what i wanted. I only have 1 issue with this in that when i put this on i can tell its plastic wants to crack at any moment. Ive been extremely careful putting them on because it doesnt seem like a smooth product. Other than that i love these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher13

customer_reviews.title: Regardless they are great, spend some time in the app to create ...
customer_reviews.text: Sickest glasses I own. I was the hit of the party. Just make sure you keep you phone near the glasses if somebody decides to take them. Regardless they are great, spend some time in the app to create your pre party messages...enjoy Oh after a few an hour or so they are not comfortable on your face. The cushion is in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Pena

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The app apparently requires facebook to work and is disabled
customer_reviews.author: terra caines

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOO AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT WAS THE HIGHLIGHT OF MY MITZVAH AND THEN AGAIN AT ULTRA! DJL!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Newberg

customer_reviews.title: One Crazy Pair of Glasses
customer_reviews.text: How do I describe these glasses? In a word, awesome. The customisability in these things is nothing short of astounding. They're easy to use, don't eat up the battery, and I'm the center of attention whenever I wear these. Treat yourself and pick up a pair for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Wh33tbread

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING LED GLASSES
customer_reviews.text: I love this LED Glasses I didn't know anything about these until i came upon a club website that sells LED stuff.I actually was searching for Cash cannons so Im glad they had these on Amazon.I can now use these for clubs,NEW YEAR's 2018,or other stuff.Definitely worth buying you won't be disappointed.I'd rate this seller more than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dino C

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product except that I had to glue back a broken hinge from someone with a bigger head than mine wore it and snapped the hinge. I did manage to fix it though. I gave the old one to my friend and am buying a new one for myself
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Din

customer_reviews.title: REALLY LIKE!!️
customer_reviews.text: The thing I dislike is it isn’t in color and the battery holder. You will be the life of the party. They are not made for operating any type of transportation vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine are faulty... Chemion, will you replace??
customer_reviews.text: When they work, I absolutely love them. My favorite option is the EQ feature when I DJ, and the glasses end up freezing up or losing connection in this mode every time. Idk if mine are faulty or what. Last night they froze up on me with just plain text scrolling... If I didn't have these issues everyone I used them, it'd be a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: DJ SoOpA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty cool and sometimes funny. My only complaints are that it feels like it’s gonna break whenever you go to put it on and the app disconnects every time you turn it off
customer_reviews.author: MiguelDelgado

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses But A Buggy Mandatory App
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the glasses, they are really cool. However, the app makes it almost impossible to download new designs. If they fixed that then the product would be flawless but sadly you can't have one without the other.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my grandson. He had been wanting them for about a year. He loves them. They are bright and easy to see and read display.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: These are great fun
customer_reviews.text: ordered these to DJ at a Halloween Party and I had a blast with them. They do exactly what they are described to do...very easy to work them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tuller

customer_reviews.title: 10/10! Higher if possible!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I wear them a little too often, but thats ok. I have been asked about them soooo many times, and, after seeing mine, at least three of my friends ordered pairs! Great product. Only flaw I can find is the drain on my phone's battery life, but since the glasses have the own storage, its no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Harry R.

customer_reviews.title: Not great at night
customer_reviews.text: The product overall was great for what it was intended for. My issues were that the battery area felt too bulky and the plastic felt slightly cheap, but my biggest issue by far was the fact that the light would show through the shutters when it is dark and make it IMPOSSIBLE to see. I could barely see anything at night when wearing them and it gave me some headaches sometimes. Im sure that was a better way to engineer the way the lights were.
customer_reviews.author: Piyush Govil

customer_reviews.title: Would not connect to Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: Would not connect to Wi-Fi, tried for an hour then I called customer service, because it included technical support, to check n go support didn't know anymore, so had to return them, disappointed that I couldn't take them on my trip
customer_reviews.author: Alan K Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 16 year old son at Christmas. We haven't heard a single complaint from him about it and his friends apparently insist he bring the glasses to any parties. He has had a lot of fun with the glasses and so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nick McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, bad design. It blocks way too much of your view.
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea, but it blocks way too much of your view. Honestly I find it difficult to get around while wearing these during the day, and in a night club, good luck seeing anything Otherwise, they are also big, just be ready for that.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy to wear
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but difficult to use. They are heavy on your nose and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: You can see just fine through them
customer_reviews.text: Product is somewhat clunky and large (if you wear glasses to see well they can be hidden beneath no problem). You can see just fine through them. You have to download the app to program them to your smart phone. I wish they displayed colors rather than just white. Fun little prop for an obnoxious LARP character.
customer_reviews.author: RolePlayingGamer

customer_reviews.title: Cool product, awful design and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cool product, it’s just not very well made. It’s relatively sturdy, but the design is just bad. It’s incredibly bulky, and it hurts to wear after a while. Also, way too pricey. I still bought it because why not, but if you’re looking for something like this I’d recommend a cheaper option with better design.
customer_reviews.author: Rees H.

customer_reviews.title: Your sweat will short it out, but otherwise a fun product
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot of fun and work great when there is no moisture around. However, if you sweat a lot, it will get into the battery compartment and short the thing out. Would give 5 stars if it was more waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Great device. I use it at my DJ gigs. Guests always comment about it positively. Be very careful with it, though!
customer_reviews.author: 3Gr8KidsDad

customer_reviews.title: These are so cool!
customer_reviews.text: One of only three things our grandson asked for for Christmas and straight out of the box did not disappoint - we all have enjoyed how the glasses screen can be customized. Great gift for teenagers!
customer_reviews.author: LanieB

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a day of use
customer_reviews.text: The product stopped working after one day of use. It would not even turn on the next day. Replaced batteries as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amin Badruddin

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 yr old wanted a pair of these. He’s loves them. Lots of fun changing up the images and colors on them! His friends love them and even wound up buying them too!
customer_reviews.author: Glogolf

customer_reviews.title: Head turner
customer_reviews.text: My son gets lots of compliments on these. A bit clunky for wear but worth it (he says) for the effect.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Knytych

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you have an Android
customer_reviews.text: I have a Galaxy S10+ and I can't get it to connect at all. I've had it for a while now and keep forgetting I even own it because it won't connect to my app. Not sure if it's the software on my phone but I've heard others have the same issue. Would not recommend to anyone (at least on Android) unless you're fine with the 5 presets the have installed.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Vann

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend wearing these for an extended period of time or ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend wearing these for an extended period of time or they will cause headaches! But they are a great conversation starter for parties
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: No instructions. Seems like great idea. Fingers crossed on quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it it wont connect
customer_reviews.text: Wont connect to Bluetooth and im still waiting on a solution or refund
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Pulled out of the box and put batteries in and ...
customer_reviews.text: Pulled out of the box and put batteries in and pressed to button to nothing happening. Tried again several time never worked
customer_reviews.author: Karmen

customer_reviews.title: Glasses broke
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them until they cracked where the button is and she can’t used them anymore 😑 didn’t take much pressure, she’s very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Spivey

customer_reviews.title: fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: kids love them. A little bulky which makes the comfort level go down
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Just received the package today and the entire battery casing fell out. The wire holding the battery casing is really flimsy and detached when I tried to put the casing back in the frame. Completely shoddy workmanship. I will be returning this piece of crap ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keyes, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile and flimsy for the money
customer_reviews.text: The functionality of these glasses are great however they are so fragile they break almost instantly and I have been crazy gluing them back together since! I would not recommend buying these get a cheaper pair that does the same thing and if they break it's not that big a deal because you can replace them for a lot less money!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Hit if the party
customer_reviews.text: If you wear these out it will change your life. Some of the best partying with these on and girls love them.
customer_reviews.author: Delvin H.

customer_reviews.title: Cool daddy glasses, buggy app
customer_reviews.text: App crashes like mad, but glasses are fun af. The arm is really big though; the parts that sticks behind your ear holds the batteries, so take into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lyman Fite

customer_reviews.title: Girls love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great attention grabber.. took some time to program things using the app but once you get the hang of it it's a blast..
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tee

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to see
customer_reviews.text: You're buying for fun not to relax in but still it was very difficult to see through and the batteries being in the end makes it a little flimsy and heavy but absolutely tons of laughs with this one very fun to use
customer_reviews.author: christopher guzman

customer_reviews.title: Okay for little kids that want to get flashy but ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay for little kids that want to get flashy but the person wearing them won't see anything so what's the use of being turned into a human Marquee!!
customer_reviews.author: Basil F Yousif

customer_reviews.title: That it doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product in the mail and it doesn't work the lights wont turn on and the batteries keep over heating and the box looks nasty
customer_reviews.author: toross

customer_reviews.title: Only Down Side Is The App
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for Decadence and I received so many compliments. The look amazing and one set of batteries lasted the whole night (6 Hours). The only issue with the app. Needs constant restarts and looses connection to the glasses pretty often.
customer_reviews.author: Greenfire

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year-old son loves these. They were his favorite Christmas present. Not sure how long he will play with them, since you just program the glasses, and they scroll what you programmed. I'm afraid he will get bored and put them in his closet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Antony

customer_reviews.title: Great when They worked
customer_reviews.text: Only used once. Kept disconnecting from my phone. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Natural King

customer_reviews.title: It's cool
customer_reviews.text: It's cool till it breaks. Need more download able screen s
customer_reviews.author: Christina Frausto

customer_reviews.title: It's all about how they look, they will get peoples attention
customer_reviews.text: These are fun looking! but they are not comfortable to wear, the battery life is low and the included software is in need of improvement
customer_reviews.author: Franz K

customer_reviews.title: Chemion glasses
customer_reviews.text: Good for cosplaying and tik toking but as far as the chemion app goes it don't work to well with the glasses works better with pc
customer_reviews.author: UndertaleSans

customer_reviews.title: Happy Birthday baby
customer_reviews.text: Gave him to my son for his birthday and he loved them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rae Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Amazon packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product it self is fine I think. When I recieved the package it was already the mailing bag and the box of which the glasses were in. The sticker that acts like a seal to know wether a box has been open before was already torn. Leading me to believe someone has gone throught it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Only A Couple of Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these just before Halloween and only used them for more than a few minutes once or twice. Now they won't turn on at all, even with fresh batteries. Sent an email to customer service a few weeks ago, and I haven't heard back from them. Not thrilled that I spent money on these as of now.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: No regrats
customer_reviews.text: Sure it seems like a waste of money, but is a really fun waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Curt S

customer_reviews.title: Very useful glasses for parties
customer_reviews.text: Great produce. Very useful to be able to customize what it says/does. Makes it perfect for almost any situation at nighttime to convey how you are feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Lavaheart

Good foundations, but crashes all the fricken time. Battery life is excellent. And securing strap is a winner.

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap China made plastic. Breaks easily. The design needs to be reevaluated for the price they sale for. I wouldn't pay no more than 25 for these. Just because they are battery powered & plastic is very fragile.

customer_reviews.title: The best party glasses

My son wears them everywhere. He Loves the attention he gets..and I'm super amazed at how well you see with them on.. They Rock

product_meta.title: CHEMION - Customizable Bluetooth LED Glasses for Raves, Festivals, Fun, Parties, Sports, Birthday, Costumes, EDM, Flashing - Display Messages, Animation, Drawings!
product_meta.description: STAND OUT IN A CROWD - If you like being the light in dark place, these shades are for you! ・ Create your own text, drawing, or animation in an app and sync it right away to the LED light grid and light up the shades. ・ Display messages to root for your sports team! ・ Shine more than the others around at a party or concert! ・ Wear your music - the graphic equalizer function captures sounds and music nearby and displays bright flashing bars of light! ・ Chemion can store 5 messages that can be interchanged with a touch of a button! ・ For those that love nighttime concerts, parties, and more, these glasses are sure to help you stick out more than the rest. ・ Wireless Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) ・ Battery: 1.5V AAA x2 (included) - lasts 8 hours (has disconnection warning) ・ Size (opened): 6.3” (width) x 8.2” (length) x 2.2” (height) ・ LED: 210 units, brightness level 3 ・ OS: only Android or iOS
feature_bullets: Unique, Fun & Entertaining! Show off your creativity!
Bluetooth enabled to connect to the CHEMION App (iOS 7 or later&Android 4.4 or later / Not available except for iOS&Android) to and instantly customize your messages!
Light up your message and make it stand out simply with the tip of your finger!
Functions include: Text, Drawing, Animation, and Equalizer display
Lightweight, fold-able, illuminative LED, built-in memory, 2 AAA batteries (included)
